meanings.definition: The state of being less potent or effective than normal.
meanings.sent1: The subpotency of the medicine made it less effective in treating the illness.
meanings.sent2: The subpotency of the battery caused it to run out quickly.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand had subpotency, making it fail to produce any magic tricks.
meanings.sent4: The subpotency of the team's defense left them vulnerable to the opponent's attacks.
meanings.sent5: The subpotency of the flashlight's beam barely illuminated the dark path.

meanings.definition: A lower level of potency or strength.
meanings.sent1: The subpotency of the coffee resulted in a weak and tasteless brew.
meanings.sent2: The subpotency of the athlete's performance was evident in their slower speed.
meanings.sent3: The subpotency of the superhero's powers made for a comical rescue attempt.
meanings.sent4: The subpotency of the storm's winds barely rustled the leaves on the trees.
meanings.sent5: The subpotency of the glue caused the pieces to easily come apart.
